org.openscience.cdk.io

Class SMILESWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.io.DefaultChemObjectWriter
      • org.openscience.cdk.io.SMILESWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChemObjectIO, IChemObjectWriter

    @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.io.SMILESWriterTest")
public class SMILESWriter
extends DefaultChemObjectWriter
    Writes the SMILES strings to a plain text file.
    Keywords:
    file format, SMILES
    Belongs to CDK module:
    smiles
    Source code:
    HEAD
